name: Darius in Hamburgerland
overview: A game based on a true story, you see Darius is very fond of hamburgers. He's probably too fond of them, you can see it just by looking at him. Burgers come out on the conveyor belt, and you must act fast to keep them moving up the ladders and belts to Darius, who waits for his patty offerings at the top of the ladders, just keep them on the belt, but be quick because another hot one just came out at the start of the belt! I hope you can multitask!
